      public void writeMapFile​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continent> continents, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Country> countries, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> borders, java.lang.String mapFile) throws java.io.IOException, ValidMapException

      Parameters:
      continents - the hashmap of continents
      countries - the hashmap of countries
      borders - the hashmap of borders

      java.io.IOException - handles exception

    • loadMap

      public boolean loadMap​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Continent> continents, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​Country> countries, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,​java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer>> borders, java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      This method loads map file and validates it.
      Parameters:
      continents - the hashmap of continents
      countries - the hashmap of countries
      borders - the hashmap of borders
      fileName - the name of the map file
      Returns:
      true if file loaded else retun false
      Throws:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - handles exceptions
